data.eml:eml: The province of Zeeland lies in the southwest of the Netherlands and covers an area of 2,933 square kilometres. Zeeland borders the Dutch provinces Zuid-Holland and Noord-Brabant, and the country Belgium. Zeeland has 381,000 inhabitants. Middelburg is its capital, but the most populous city is Terneuzen.Positive observations without protocolDataset available via https://www.ndff.nl/english / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nl292,788 records (March 2018)
